keyActivities: Curating luxury fashion, online retail platform, logistics, marketing
keyResources: Fashion inventory, website, mobile app, supply chain, customer service
valueProposition: Exclusive and unique luxury fashion items available worldwide, seamless shopping experience, fast global shipping
customerRelationships: Personalized online shopping, customer service, loyalty program, exclusive offers
channels: Website, mobile app, social media, email marketing
customerSegments: Luxury fashion consumers, fashion enthusiasts, high-income individuals
structure: E-commerce platform, supply chain, logistics, customer support
revenueStreams: Sales of luxury fashion items, commission from partners
problem: Difficulty in accessing luxury fashion items from global brands and boutiques
solution: Curated luxury fashion platform connecting global brands and boutiques to customers worldwide
keyMetrics: Sales volume, customer retention rate, average order value, website and app traffic
uniqueSellingProposition: Exclusive partnerships with luxury brands, wide range of unique products, fast global shipping
highLevelConcept: A global marketplace for luxury fashion enthusiasts to access exclusive items from top brands and boutiques
unfairAdvantage: Strong relationships with luxury fashion brands and boutiques, technology-driven personalized shopping experience
earlyAdopters: Fashion-forward individuals, luxury shoppers, brand-conscious consumers
mobileAdvantages: Seamless shopping experience on-the-go, personalized product recommendations, easy checkout
camera: Visual search for fashion items, virtual try-on feature
appIntegrations: Integration with social media platforms, fashion blogs, and loyalty programs
location: Localized product recommendations, personalized offers based on location
attractUsers: Targeted advertising, influencer collaborations, social media campaigns
offline: Pop-up shops, temporary brand collaborations, exclusive in-person events
appSavings: Exclusive app-only offers, personalized discounts and promotions
inAppPayments: Secure in-app payment options, digital wallet integration
peopleAndRoles: Executive team for strategy and operations, marketing team, technology team, customer support team, supply chain and logistics team
commonGoals: Revolutionize the luxury fashion retail industry, create a seamless shopping experience, expand global presence
personalGoals: Grow Farfetch as a leading luxury fashion platform, establish strong partnerships with fashion brands and boutiques
purpose: Make luxury fashion accessible and provide an unparalleled shopping experience
needsAndExpectations: Offer an extensive range of luxury fashion items, maintain a high level of customer satisfaction
rulesAndActivities: Curating products, optimizing website and app, marketing campaigns, customer support, logistics
strengthsAndAssets: Exclusive partnerships, wide product range, global reach, strong brand reputation
weaknessesAndRisks: Competition from other luxury e-commerce platforms, counterfeit products, potential supply chain disruptions
buyerPersona: High-income individuals seeking exclusive luxury fashion items, brand-conscious consumers
buyerGoals: Acquire unique and exclusive luxury fashion items, enjoy a seamless shopping experience
buyerInitiatives: Keeping up with fashion trends, seeking exclusive items, engaging with luxury fashion brands
buyingProcess: Browse website or mobile app, add desired items to cart, proceed to checkout, make payment, receive order confirmation
buyTiming: Seasonal fashion collections, limited edition items, sales and promotions
buyerThinking: The customer seeks a convenient and reliable platform to access luxury fashion items from top brands and boutiques
buyerChannels: Website, mobile app, social media, email marketing, influencer partnerships
whyBuy: Exclusive product selection, fast global shipping, personalized shopping experience, strong brand reputation
buyerInfluencers: Fashion influencers, luxury brand promotions, fashion editorials, celebrity endorsements
buyerContent: Fashion lookbooks, curated product collections, trend articles, social media content, email newsletters
strengths: Strong brand partnerships, wide product range, global reach, technology-driven personalization
opportunities: Expansion into emerging luxury markets, collaboration with sustainable and ethical brands, leveraging new technologies like AR/VR for enhanced shopping experience
weaknesses: Competition from other luxury e-commerce platforms, reliance on brand partnerships, potential fluctuations in luxury market
threats: Economic downturn affecting luxury spending, changes in consumer preferences, counterfeit products entering the market
productsAndServices: Luxury fashion items, curated collections, personalized recommendations, loyalty program
gainCreators: Access to exclusive luxury fashion items, seamless shopping experience, personalized offers and promotions
painRelievers: Convenient online shopping, fast global shipping, reliable customer support
gains: The customer enjoys a unique and curated selection of luxury fashion items, exclusive offers, and a personalized shopping experience
pains: The customer may face difficulty in finding desired luxury fashion items, dealing with counterfeit products, or navigating complicated websites
customerJobs: The customer seeks to purchase luxury fashion items from top brands and boutiques while enjoying a seamless shopping experience
